values: 航海；航行；起航；水运航班；帆船；帆船运动
驾驶帆船；乘船航行；迅速行进；（sail的现在分词）

word_group.phrase: at sea sailing on all at sea

word_group.brief_definition: 去航海；去划船；扬帆出海
启航日期；船期；开船日期

bilingual.target: 航行是一种流行的爱好。

bilingual.source: Rob and Bob met at the dock to go sailing on their boat.
bilingual.target: 罗布和鲍勃在码头见面去乘船航行。
大风使得航行变得危险。

bilingual.source: The seas were calm and perfect for sailing.
bilingual.target: 海洋很平静，非常适合航行。

bilingual.source: I enjoy sailing on the lake every weekend.
bilingual.target: 我每个周末都喜欢在湖上航行。

bilingual.source: Sailing a boat in a headwind is very difficult.
bilingual.target: 船只在逆风中航行非常困难。

bilingual.source: We decided to go sailing on the windless day.
bilingual.target: 我们决定在无风的日子去航行。

bilingual.source: Sailing can be both relaxing and challenging.
bilingual.target: 航行既可以放松也可以充满挑战。

bilingual.source: They went sailing in the Mediterranean Sea last summer.
bilingual.target: 他们去年夏天在地中海航行。

list.abstract: 《Sailing》是Rod Stewart演唱的一首英文流行歌曲，由Gavin Sutherland作词、作曲，收录于1975年2月14日发行的专辑《Atlantic Crossing》中。这首歌也是《哥伦布传/1492 Conquest of Paradise》的主题曲。 《Sailing》朴实无华、意境悠远，既有心情的宣泄，又带点淡淡的忧伤，透出一股苍茫，给人以力量。

yingyinNormal.en: Captain Dog likes sailing across duck ponds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 狗船长很喜欢在鸭子池塘驾船航行。

yingyinNormal.en: Captain Dog likes sailing across duck ponds. Everyone likes sailing across duck ponds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 狗船长很喜欢在鸭子池塘驾船航行。大家都喜欢在鸭子池塘驾船航行。

yingyinNormal.en: Leave the sailing to us Captain Dog. Yes, and when they get lost again, you can rescue them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把航行的事交给我们，狗船长。好的，当他们再迷路的时候，你可以再救他们。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a sea captain, sailing across the sea. We are jolly pirates, shivery timbers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我实在海上航行的船长，穿过茫茫的大海。我们就是快乐的海盗，你就放马过来吧。啊哈！

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a sea captain, sailing across the sea. We are jolly pirates, shiver me timbers
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是在海上航行的船长，穿过茫茫的大海。我们就是快乐的海盗，你就放马过来吧。啊哈！

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, where are you going? Me? I was just thinking of sailing around the world again. But Daddy, you're not a sailor anymore. No, of course not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，你要去哪？我吗？我刚刚在想又要在全世界航行了。但是爸爸，你已经不是船员了。是的，当然不是了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, the sailing boat does have an engine. Full sail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，帆船上有引擎。全速前进！

yingyinNormal.en: We are sailing to Pirate Island. Goodbye Grampy Rabbit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要驶向海盗岛了。再见，兔爷爷。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, we are sailing. We are canoeing. We are paddling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，我们在驾驶帆船。我们在划独木舟。我们在脚踩脚踏船。

yingyinNormal.en: Here come Danny and Captain Dog. We win. I was exhausting, next time we'll take a sailing boat. Yes, sailing boats have engines on them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 丹尼，狗船长也来了。我们赢了！我累坏了，下次我们租个帆船吧。是的，有引擎的帆船。

yingyinNormal.en: We are sailing to the shops. Do you need anything? Yes, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要开船去超市，你们要带点什么吗。是的，拜托了。

yingyinNormal.en: Wind is surf westerly. The waters are calm. My last adventure was sailing a boat around the world. My next adventure is sailing a boat across a duck pond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即时风向西南风，非常的平静。我的上一次冒险是驾驶我的船离开温暖的家环游世界。我的下一个冒险是驾驶这艘小船横渡这整个鸭子池塘。哈哈哈。

yingyinNormal.en: Wind is surf westerly. The waters are calm. My last adventure was sailing a boat around the world. My next adventure is sailing a boat across a duck pond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即时风向西南风，非常的平静。我的上一次冒险是驾驶我的船离开温暖的家环游世界。我的下一个冒险是驾驶这艘小船横渡这整个鸭子池塘。哈哈哈。

yingyinNormal.en: Here is Granddad Dog. Aha there. Aha there. Lovely day to go sailing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 狗爷爷在这里。你好啊，狗爷爷。你好啊，猪爷爷。今天是个出游的好日子。

yingyinNormal.en: I got sailing boats. It's a bit tricky to sail a sailing boat. And I got pedalos, they are nice and relaxing. Yes, they've got a big paddle wheel to make them go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有帆船。驾驶帆船是需要一点技术的。我还有脚踏船，他们比较休闲轻松。是的，你有一个大大的桨轮让它前进。

yingyinNormal.en: George, you could wear my pirate hat. Today, we are sailing to pirate island.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，你可以带上我的海盗帽。我们今天要开着船，到海盗岛去。

yingyinNormal.en: We'd like a boat, please. Certainly, I have canoes, sailing boats or pedalos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想租一条船，谢谢。当然可以，我有独木舟，帆船和脚踏船。

yingyinNormal.en: Ahoy. Hey. How's the boat? Great. I'm finally getting into this sailing stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们好。驾帆船出海还好玩吧？好玩，我开始喜欢驾驶帆船了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ahoy there. Peppa and George. We are ready to go sailing. I'll move the boat to a bit nearer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们好啊，佩奇还有乔治。我们做好出海的准备了。我来把船开近一点吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't sail the world and make my fortune to splash around in a pedalo. We'll take the sailing boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想坐在独木舟上让我的财宝被溅湿。那我们租帆船。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 水手；海员；水兵；航海者；不晕船／常晕船的人
n. 航海；航行；起航；水运航班

word_family.mean: n. 帆；帆状物；功能似帆的物体；航程；旅行；油布；篷帆布；帆船的使用；航行

examination_example.sentence: Life past 40 is far from smooth <highlight>sailing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过了40岁的生活远非一帆风顺。

examination_example.sentence: And, if Tom goes, we could go <highlight>sailing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果汤姆去了，我们就可以去航海了。

examination_example.sentence: We will save as much as we can and go <highlight>sailing</highlight> next July.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将尽可能地攒钱，明年7月去航海。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: The color of the real <highlight>sailing</highlight> ship was white and gold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 真正的帆船是白色和金色的。

examination_example.sentence: In the painting the <highlight>sailing</highlight> ship was going towards the sunset.
It shows the old <highlight>sailing</highlight> ship, the Temeraire, on the River Thames near London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它展示了伦敦附近泰晤士河上的一艘古老的帆船Temeraire号。
